scripts.predev: node -e "const cwd=process.cwd(); if (process.platform==='win32' && cwd.includes('&')) { console.error('Error: Project path contains an ampersand (&). On Windows, npm scripts run via cmd.exe, which treats & as a command separator. Move/rename the folder to remove &, or run from a subst drive, then try again.'); process.exit(1); }"
